title: Court accepts plea to dissolve CG Power Solutions
description: The tribunal had also allowed the lenders' plea to pursue recovery against the erstwhile promoters under the bankruptcy laws even after the dissolution of the company. Originally, the company had only two creditors including its holding company CG Power & Industrial Solutions and its financial creditor Stickwell (India).
